metadata.name: NesRox 2K Follower "Head in the Clouds" Giveaway
metadata.description:
"Head in the Clouds" is a special edition, audio-visual, Ai + 2D art piece  that was given away to celebrate the artist, NesRox, reaching 2,000+ Twitter followers. The winner of this giveaway had the opportunity to choose the art they wanted to receive, making this piece truly unique and one-of-a-kind.

The art consists of a calm depiction of a black woman with clouds moving through the afro puffs of her soft, natural hair. The small clouds add a sense of movement and energy to the piece, while the background is filled with slowly moving larger clouds, adding depth and a sense of ethereal beauty.

This piece a powerful celebration of beauty and self-expression in one's natural state.
